item.title: 07-机器语言和名词解释
item.author: 作者
item.description: Program with machine language according to the following C int8_t a = 1; int8_t c = a + 3; Write your assembly code & machine code Assembly Code: mov cx, 01h addi ax, cx, 03h Machine Code: 1011 1001 0001 0000 0000 0000 ; mov ax, 01h ; 1011 w reg data (data if w = 1) ; 第一个字节前4位是操作码
